casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carlton Washington TOMLINSON. No. 319P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 10, 2015. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Tomlinson, Carlton Washington. Staples S. Hughes, Appellate Defender. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of September 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of September 2015."
